body.name: Triple Bunk Bed Twin Over Twin, Metal Triple Twin Bedframe with Guardrail & Ladder, Can Be Separated into 3 Twin Beds/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assemble
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.

features: Triple Bunk Bed Twin Over Twin

【3 Bunk Beds in 1 Design】Unique triple bunk bed features one twin size upper bunk over two twin size down beds for three kids while take up little floor space which especially suitable for rooms with compact space, this metal triple bunk beds is ideal for accommodating guests and sleepovers, and also perfect for family with multiple kids.

【Safety guaranteed】Surrounded with full length guard rails for top bunk gives extra safety.Built-in ladders on each side let you reach upper bunk easily and safely.More than that, this bunk bed has passed several Children's Product Certificate (CPC) tests and keep your kids away from accidentally harm.

【Multi-Functional Metal Bunk Bed】This metal triple bed frame can be divided into three separate twin beds or a bunk bed with a single bed to meet your different needs.With a practical design, You can divide it into three separate beds and put them in different rooms when your children grow up.Contemporary design makes it easy to integrate into your bedroom decoration.

【Noise Reduced】With the design of EVA center support beam and slat lockers, we have significantly reduced squeak noise that triple twin bunk bed usually have in common.You will have a good and quiet sleep from now on.

【Easy Assembly Metal 3 Bed Frame】This elegant triple bunk bed comes with clear instruction that will guide you through all steps.Each part is numbered and has a clear manual, all tools included, no need to worry about installation.Weight capability: Upper bed - 250 LBS, Bottom bed one - 350 LBS, Bottom bed two - 350 LBS.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Three Sleeping Space Can Be Separated 3 Bunk Beds Easily transform the bunk bed into three separate beds to accommodate guests, providing a comfortable and versatile sleeping solution. As children grow, the separable design allows for independent sleeping spaces, accommodating different preferences and ages.

Solid and Stable Structure The combination of metal slats and a sturdy supporting beam creates a foundation that stands the test of time, offering unwavering support and security. Weight Capacity: Top bed: 250 LBS; Bottom bed 1: 350 LBS; Bottom bed 2: 350 LBS. CPC Security Certification Safety guaranteed: Our triple bunk bed surrounded with full-length guard rails for the top bunk gives extra safety. Built-in ladders on each side let you reach the upper bunk easily and safely. More than that, this bunk bed has passed several Children's Product Certificate (CPC) tests and keeps your kids away from accidental harm. Safety Ladder The triple twin bunk bed has built-in ladders on each side to let you reach the upper bunk easily and safely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great once put together
reviews.reviewText: The directions are not directions. Took me way longer than I'd like to admit to put this thing together. 3 stars only because the directions were horrible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth it
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son who is almost 4 and he loves this bed. Him and his two year-old sister share a room and let me tell you they both love being up there and going down the slide. They are obsessed with this bed it was easy to put together that came with everything needed besides the mattress we just went ahead and bought a twin size memory foam 7 inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Deep ridge on slide
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My granddaughter’s first time down the slide and caught her toes in the ridge between the white board and the wood panel at the end of the slide. Not impressed with this and have no idea how to ‘fix’ this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Didn’t put the slide up because I have to move his dresser in order for it fit , bed is cute easy to put together but a lot of pieces to screw together , not as stable as I would like and the wood easily breaks but all in all it’s a pretty decent bed
